message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your deal wasn't quite fair to me. This is my counter-offer. It accounts for the fact that the value decreases faster for me.
Considering the inflation, my new offer is slightly more generous. Take it before it's too late!
This is getting ridiculous. We are losing money because of our greed. Let's split it evenly and call it a day!
